data.text:
Upcoming Events:

July 19-21, 2024

Book Passage Mystery Writers Conference

Corte Madera, CA

Cara is the conference co-chair.

July 21, 2024

Adventures By The Book Presents: Reading Between The Vines

Hook & Ladder Winery

2134 Olivet Road

Santa Rosa, CA

11 AM

Free event! Wine and books will be available for purchase.

April 20-25, 2025

April in Paris! Contact Meg at mwhalenmj55@gmail.com to learn more about this exclusive trip.

“Five Things” Class:

Cara’s online seminar “Five Things I’ve Learned About Crafting a Sense of Place” is available to stream!

Discover the five things Cara has learned about the ways that a strong sense of place anchors readers and draws them into the story.

Buy a ticket here.
